data.lyric:
[ti:obvious (Explicit)]
[ar:Ariana Grande]
[al:Positions]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]obvious (Explicit) - Ariana Grande (爱莉安娜·格兰德)
[00:00.16]Lyrics by：Tommy Brown/Travis Sayles/Josh Conerly/Ariana Grande/Ryan Tedder/Nija Charles/Steven Franks/Peter Lee Johnson
[00:00.33]Composed by：Tommy Brown/Travis Sayles/Josh Conerly/Ariana Grande/Ryan Tedder/Nija Charles/Steven Franks/Peter Lee Johnson
[00:00.50]I love the taste of you in the morning
[00:03.10]Keep me warm and
[00:04.97]Nothin' else nothin' more important
[00:08.13]Makes me wanna believe in love
[00:11.86]Mmm
[00:12.42]I love the thought of us in the evening
[00:15.05]Crave the feeling
[00:16.89]The way you feel somethin' 'bout a feeling
[00:19.93]I'm praying we don't f**k this up
[00:23.51]Ah-ah-ah babe
[00:25.31]Others that I've had had to impress me before
[00:28.23]But I knew you were the real thing
[00:29.54]When you walked through the door
[00:31.49]I didn't think I would have to spell it out
[00:35.16]Don't put the bands put the bands on me
[00:38.43]All my love all my love is free
[00:41.37]Ain't no price on my loyalty
[00:44.50]No s**t got me right where you want me baby
[00:47.73]Could I be more obvious?
[00:49.87]Ooh
[00:50.33]Hard to think when I'm under you
[00:53.35]Tell you all of my dirty truths
[00:56.37]No s**t got me right where you want me baby
[00:59.69]Could I be more obvious?
[01:01.88]Maybe if I'm lucky you might stay the afternoon
[01:04.76]If you gotta work just promise me you'll come back soon
[01:08.08]Maybe you should pack a suitcase too
[01:11.54]Too
[01:12.35]I love the thought of you never leavin'
[01:14.91]No
[01:15.18]Days are beating
[01:16.69]Gettin' steps up on the treadmill while you sleepin'
[01:20.08]Never thought I'd believe in love again
[01:25.31]Others that I've had had to impress me before
[01:28.17]But I knew you were the real thing
[01:29.53]When you walked through the door
[01:31.46]I didn't think I would have to spell it out
[01:35.22]Don't put the bands put the bands on me
[01:38.32]All my love all my love is free
[01:41.31]Ain't no price on my loyalty
[01:44.37]No s**t got me right where you want me baby
[01:47.71]Could I be more obvious?
[01:49.87]Ooh
[01:50.42]Hard to think when I'm under you
[01:53.29]Tell you all of my dirty truths
[01:56.36]No s**t got me right where you want me baby
[01:59.66]Could I be more obvious?
data.trans:
[ti:obvious (Explicit)]
[ar:Ariana Grande]
[al:Positions]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.16]//
[00:00.33]//
[00:00.50]你喜欢你清晨时的味道
[00:03.10]让我感到温暖
[00:04.97]没有什么比这更重要
[00:08.13]让我想要相信爱情
[00:11.86]//
[00:12.42]我喜欢我们在夜晚的想法
[00:15.05]心中充满渴望
[00:16.89]你对于这份悸动的感觉
[00:19.93]我祈祷我们不会搞砸一切
[00:23.51]宝贝
[00:25.31]我以前遇见的人给我留下深刻的印象
[00:28.23]但是我知道你情真意切
[00:29.54]当你走进房门时
[00:31.49]我以为我没有必要吐露心声
[00:35.16]不要束缚着我
[00:38.43]我所有的爱都是自由的
[00:41.37]我的忠诚是无价的
[00:44.50]不要推脱 把我带到你想让我去的地方 宝贝
[00:47.73]我是否应该暗示得再明显一点
[00:49.87]//
[00:50.33]无法想象我与你亲密无间的样子
[00:53.35]把我不为人知的秘密告诉你
[00:56.37]不要推脱 把我带到你想让我去的地方 宝贝
[00:59.69]我是否应该暗示得再明显一点
[01:01.88]也许 如果我足够幸运 你可能会待到下午
[01:04.76]如果你要去工作 答应我你很快就会回到我身边
[01:08.08]也许 你也应该打包好行李
[01:11.54]与我一样
[01:12.35]我喜欢你不离不弃的想法
[01:14.91]//
[01:15.18]日子波澜不惊
[01:16.69]当你酣睡的时候 我投入到枯燥乏味的工作里
[01:20.08]从未想过我会再次相信爱情
[01:25.31]我以前遇见的人给我留下深刻的印象
[01:28.17]但是我知道你情真意切
[01:29.53]当你走进房门时
[01:31.46]我以为我没有必要吐露心声
[01:35.22]不要束缚着我
[01:38.32]我所有的爱都是自由的
[01:41.31]我的忠诚是无价的
[01:44.37]不要推脱 把我带到你想让我去的地方 宝贝
[01:47.71]我是否应该暗示得再明显一点
[01:49.87]//
[01:50.42]无法想象我与你亲密无间的样子
[01:53.29]把我不为人知的秘密告诉你
[01:56.36]不要推脱 把我带到你想让我去的地方 宝贝
[01:59.66]我是否应该暗示得再明显一点
